name: Super Balls Defense Base Craft
description:
What if pinball and tower defense came together and had a lovely bouncing baby game named "SUPER BALLS DEFENSE BASE CRAFT"?

Well that's what we have for you. Use:
- A/D or Left/Right to control flippers.
- Mouse to select passive build spots (small circles) or tower build spots (big circles)
- Build spike & shooting towers to kill the balls
- Build passive mineral & gas collectors to generate minerals
- Build mineral and gas towers to build blocking mineral and gas generators
- Build passive slow towers to pump the brakes on the balls as they get close
- Build passive damage tower to punish balls that get too close
